text: like, we all know politics is a complete sham on here run by people only looking out for their own interests, but damn you all go very mask off the second you can get a dopamine rush from throwing others under the bus even if those are supposed to be your allies lol

thinking about all the leftists who don't care about sports ever coming together to make jokes about the super league despite it being just the worst greedy power grab by the elite and wealthy to ever occur in sports. i spit on all of you fraudulent fucks
